itemInfo.itemDesc: Accessory made of Translucent Crystal. Those who want happiness carry this around with them as a charm.

item.name: Translucent Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Translucent Crystals found near Goblin Cave.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.
